Lúcio.name: Soundwave
Lúcio.description: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

Lúcio.name: Amp It Up
Lúcio.description: Raise Lúcio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost to 114 (+4% per level) health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

Lúcio.name: Sound Barrier
Lúcio.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

Lúcio.name: Reverse Amp
Lúcio.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.  Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

Lúcio.name: Wall Ride
Lúcio.description: When moving alongside impassable battleground terrain and Structures, Lúcio can walk through other units and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%.  This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

Lúcio.name: Skate Mode
Lúcio.description: Lúcio can shoot while moving. Lúcio skates or dies!

Lúcio.name: Crossfade
Lúcio.description: Currently playing Speed Boost, increasing the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 20%.  Toggle to play Healing Boost instead.

LucioCrossfadeActivateHealingBoost.name: Crossfade
LucioCrossfadeActivateHealingBoost.description: Currently playing Healing Boost, passively healing Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 (+4% per level) health per second.  Toggle to play Speed Boost instead.

1.name: Maximum Tempo
1.description: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Crossfade's Speed Boost is active.  Reward: Permanently increase the Amp It Up bonus for Crossfade's Speed Boost to 60%.

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

1.name: Slip
1.description: Passing through or near an enemy Hero during Wall Ride's effect increases its Movement Speed bonus to 70% for 1 second.

4.name: Subwoofer
4.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 50% farther.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

4.name: Chase the Bass
4.description: Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

7.name: Party Mix
7.description: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

7.name: Sonic Amplifier
7.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

10.name: Reverse Amp
10.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 104 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.  Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

13.name: Beat Mixing
13.description: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lúcio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that lasts indefinitely.  Switching tracks again removes the Shield.

13.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
13.description: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, Lúcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

13.name: Hard Style
13.description: Gain 25 Armor while Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Back in the Mix
13.description: Heal for 245 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Rejuvenescência
16.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum health each second.

16.name: Bring it Together
16.description: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

20.name: Nonstop Remix
20.description: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

20.name: Bonus Track
20.description: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration.  Can only happen once per cast.

20.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
20.description: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on Lúcio.
